about_the_game:
Welcome to Neisis, a 2D RTS game that immerses you in a fantastic medieval world where knights battle orcs for control of resources. In this game, you have the option to play either as the knights, with their well-equipped army and refined combat techniques, or the orcs, with their brute strength and tactical ingenuity.

At the start of each game, you will need to build your base, collect resources, train units, and devise a strategy to defeat your opponent. One of the main resources in the game is gold, which can be collected from gold mines located on the map. You will need to manage your economy carefully to construct buildings, train units, and make upgrades to make your army stronger.

Terrain is an important element in Neisis, with trees that can be chopped down to free up space and provide wood for building and defenses. Additionally, the map's topography can have an impact on battles, with hills offering a height advantage and rivers that can slow units.

Battles in Neisis are intense and strategic, with a wide variety of units to use to defeat your opponent. Knights have access to archers, swordsmen, and heavy knights, while orcs can train orcs, archer orcs, and heavy orcs. Each unit has its own strengths and weaknesses, so it's important to understand their use in different combat situations.

With colorful 2D graphics and immersive gameplay, Neisis is an RTS game that will appeal to strategy game fans. Are you ready to take on the challenge and conquer Neisis?
